attributes.action: Knight Neil Warnock for his contribution to football.
attributes.additional_details: Neil Warnock holds a special place in hearts of most football fans in the United Kingdom. His contribution to this great sport should not go unrecognised.
attributes.background: To open a discussion about knighting the almighty Neil Warnock

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
